arabicText: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍۢ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
englishTranslationText:
therefore	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	enlighten,	for	by	the	
munificence	of	your	Lord,	you	are	neither	a	soothsayer	nor	a	madman.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	aey	Mehboob!	Tum	nasihat	farmāo		ke	tum	apne	Rab	ke	fazl	se	na	kāhin	ho	na	majnoon.

arabicText: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌۭ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
englishTranslationText: Or	they	allege,	“He	is	a	poet	–	we	await	a	calamity	of	the	times	to	befall	him.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Ya	kehte	haiñ	yeh	shā'ir	haiñ	hameiñ	in	par	hawādis-e-zamāna	ka	intezār	hai

arabicText: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
englishTranslationText: Proclaim,	“Go	on	waiting	–	I	too	am	waiting	along	with	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Tum	farmāo	intezār	kiye	jāo	maiñ	bhi	tumhāre	intezār	meiñ	hooñ

arabicText: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌۭ طَاغُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Is	this	what	their	senses	tell	them,	or	are	
they	a	rebellious	people?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Is	kya	unki	áqleiñ	unheiñ	yehi	batāti	haiñ	
ya	woh	sarkash	log	haiñ

arabicText: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌۭ طَاغُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Is	this	what	their	senses	tell	them,	or	are	
they	a	rebellious	people?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Is	kya	unki	áqleiñ	unheiñ	yehi	batāti	haiñ	
ya	woh	sarkash	log	haiñ

arabicText: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌۭ طَاغُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Is	this	what	their	senses	tell	them,	or	are	
they	a	rebellious	people?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Is	kya	unki	áqleiñ	unheiñ	yehi	batāti	haiñ	
ya	woh	sarkash	log	haiñ

arabicText: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
What!	They	say,	“He	has	invented	the	
Qur'an”?	Rather	they	do	not	have	faith.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	kehte	haiñ	unhoñ	ne	yeh	Qur’ān	banā	
liya	balke	woh	imān	nahi	rakhte

arabicText: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍۢ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	let	them	bring	a	single	discourse	like	it,	
if	they	are	truthful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	is	jaisi	ek	bāt	to	le	āayeñ	agar	sachche	
haiñ.

arabicText: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Have	they	not	been	created	from	some	
source,	or	are	they	themselves	the	
creators?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	woh	kisi	asl	se	na	banāye	gaye	ya	
wohi	banāne	wāle	haiñ

arabicText: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	did	they	create	the	heavens	and	the	
earth?	Rather	they	are	not	certain.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	āasmān	aur	zameen	unhoñ	ne	paida	
kiye	balke	unheiñ	yaqeen nahi

arabicText: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	do	they	have	the	treasures	of	your	
Lord,	or	are	they	the	authority?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	unke	pās	tumhāre	Rab	ke	khazāne	haiñ	
ya	woh	kadode	(Hākim-e-Ā’alā)	haiñ

arabicText: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌۭ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
englishTranslationText:
Or	do	they	have	any	stairs,	climbing	upon	
which	they	eavesdrop?	So	their	eavesdropper	
should	bring	some	clear	proof!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	unke	pās	koi	zeena	hai	jis	meiñ	chadh	
kar	sun	lete	haiñ	to	unka	sunne	wāla	koi	
raushan	sanad	lāaye

arabicText: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
What!	The	daughters	for	Him,	and	the	
sons	for	you?
romanUrduTranslationText: Kya	usko	betiyāñ	aur	tum	ko	bete

arabicText: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًۭا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍۢ مُّثْقَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	do	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	ask	any	
fee	from	them,	so	they	are	burdened	with	
the	penalty?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	tum	un	se	kuch	ujrat	māñgte	ho	to	who	
chatti	(Tāwān)	ke	bojh	meiñ	dabe	haiñ

arabicText: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	is	the	hidden	with	them,	by	which	they	
pass	judgements?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	unke	pās	ghaib	haiñ	jis	se	woh	ḥukm		
lagāte	haiñ

arabicText: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًۭا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	are	they	planning	a	conspiracy?	So	the	
conspiracy	will	befall	only	upon	the	
disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	kisi	dā'oñ	(Fareb)	ke	irāde	meiñ	haiñ 
to	kāfiroñ		hi	par	dā'oñ	(Fareb)	padna	hai

arabicText: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Or	do	they	have	a	God	besides	Allah?	Purity	
is	to	Allah	from	their	ascribing	of	partners	
to	Him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ya	Allah	ke	siwa	unka	koi	aur	khuda	hai	
Allah	ko	pāki	unke	shirk	se.

arabicText: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًۭا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌۭ مَّرْكُومٌۭ
englishTranslationText: And	were	they	to	see	a	portion	of	the	sky	falling,	they	will	say,	“It	is	a	heap	of	clouds.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	āasmān	se	koi	tukda	girta	
dekheiñ	to	kaheñ	ge	teh	ba-teh	bādal	hai

arabicText: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
englishTranslationText: Therefore	leave	them,	until	they	confront	their	day,	in	which	they	will	be	stunned.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	tum	unheiñ	chord	do	yahāñ	tak	ke	woh	
apne	us	din	se	mileñ	jis	meiñ	be-hosh	
hoñge

arabicText: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
englishTranslationText: A	day	on	which	their	scheming	will	not	benefit	them	at	all,	nor	will	they	be	helped.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jis	din	unka	dā'on	(Fareb)	kuch	kām	na	dega	aur	na	unki	madad	ho

arabicText: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًۭا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	for	the	unjust	is	another	punishment	before	this,	but	most	of	them	do	not	know.	
(Punishment	in	the	grave	is	proven	by	this	verse.)
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	be-shak		zālimoñ	ke	liye	is	se	pehle	ek	‘aƶāb	hai	magar	un	meiñ	aksar	ko	khabar	nahi

arabicText: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
englishTranslationText:
And	be	patient	upon	your	Lord’s	command,	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	
upon	him),	for	you	are	indeed	in	Our	sight;	and	proclaim	the	Purity	of	your	Lord	while	praising	
Him,	whenever	you	stand.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	aey	Mehboob!	Tum	apne	Rab	ke	ḥukm	par	thehre	raho	ke	be-shak	tum	hamāri	nigeh-dāsht	
meiñ	ho	aur	apne	Rab	ki	t’areef	karte	huwe	uski	pāki	bolo

arabicText: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
englishTranslationText: And	proclaim	His	Purity	during	the	night,	and	when	the	stars	turn	back.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jab	tum	khade	ho	aur	kuch	rāt	meiñ	uski	pāki	bolo	aur	tāroñ	ke	peeth	dete.

arabicText: وَٱلنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
englishTranslationText:
By	oath	of	the	beloved	shining	star	
Muhammad	(peace and blessings be 
upon him),	when	he	returned	from	the	
Ascent.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Is	piyare	chamakte	tāre	Muhammad	ki	
qasam jab	yeh	M'erāj	se	utre

arabicText: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَىٰ
englishTranslationText:
Never	did	your	master	stray	nor	did	he	
ever	leave	the	right	path.
romanUrduTranslationText: Tumhāre	sāheb	na	behke	na	be-rāh	chale

arabicText: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰٓ
englishTranslationText:
And	he	does	not	say	anything	by	his	own	
desire.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	koi	bāt	apni	khwahish	se	nahi	
karte.

arabicText: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْىٌۭ يُوحَىٰ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	but	a	divine	revelation,	which	is	
revealed	to	him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	to	nahi	magar	waḥi	jo	unheiñ	ki	jāti	
hai

arabicText: عَلَّمَهُۥ شَدِيدُ ٱلْقُوَىٰ
englishTranslationText:
He	has	been	taught	by	the	Extremely	
Powerful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unheiñ	sikhaya	sakht	quwwatoñ	wāle	
tāqatwar	ne

arabicText: ذُو مِرَّةٍۢ فَٱسْتَوَىٰ
englishTranslationText: The	Strong;	then	the	Spectacle	inclined.
romanUrduTranslationText: Phir	us	jalwe	ne	qasd	farmāya

arabicText: وَهُوَ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
englishTranslationText:
And	he	was	on	the	horizon	of	the	highest	
heaven.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	āsmān-e-bareeñ	ke	sab	se	
buland	kināre	par	tha
